recipes.name: Classic Margherita Pizza
recipes.description: A traditional Italian pizza with fresh basil, mozzarella, and tomatoes
recipes.instructions:
1. Preheat oven to 500°F
2. Roll out dough
3. Add tomatoes, cheese
4. Bake for 12-15 minutes
5. Add fresh basil

recipes.name: Classic French Onion Soup

5. Broil
